trans-unit.source: Treasure Hunt
trans-unit.target: Treasure Hunt

trans-unit.resname: PIDW·1 | Treasure Hunt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card, then put all cards revealed this way into your hand.
trans-unit.target: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card, then put all cards revealed this way into your hand.

trans-unit.target: Faithless Looting

trans-unit.target: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

trans-unit.resname: PIDW·2 | Faithless Looting | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

trans-unit.source: Standstill
trans-unit.target: Standstill

trans-unit.target: When a player casts a spell, sacrifice CARDNAME. If you do, each of that player's opponents draws three cards.

trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

trans-unit.target: Whenever you cast a spell, you may return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
